# zoolabs

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/aliciamrich/zoolabs/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/aliciamrich/zoolabs/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

Welcome to the zoolabs package. This package is for students taking Zoo Biology at UNO with Dr. Rich. It contains the necessary data, functions, and scripts to complete our lab modules.

## Installation

You can install the development version of zoolabs from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("aliciamrich/zoolabs")
```
